thread.title: WTF | Watch: Man makes decidedly unscary flying ghost drone for Halloween
thread.title_full: WTF | Watch: Man makes decidedly unscary flying ghost drone for Halloween - entertainment.ie

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: WTF | Watch: Man makes decidedly unscary flying ghost drone for Halloween
text:
Maybe if it were dark, and the sound of the four helicopter wings spinning was muffled or drowned out and we were already on edge might we be scared but honestly, this guy's attempt at a spooky ghost to torment people with on Halloween is pretty lame.
A for effort though.
Via YouTube
MORE: Pic: Truck driver allegedly caught a ghost on camera at Jack Lynch Tunnel in Cork
MORE: Watch: Farmer goes fishing with his drone and catches one on his first try
MORE: Watch: Fantastic Four's Human Torch gets the drone treatment and flies around New York
